name: YouChooseSupermanAdventures
0:
”Alexa, open Superman Adventures”
”Alexa, play Superman Adventures”
”Alexa, open Superman Adventures and go to the Stories Menu”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: superman adventures
Developer Terms of Use
des: YOU CHOOSE: SUPERMAN ADVENTURES is a You Choose bundle from Capstone, powered by Earplay. This bundle features four action-packed, interactive stories, including Metropolis Mayhem, Apokolips Invasion, Metallo Attacks!, and Superman Day Disaster. With simple voice commands, you help Superman protect the citizens of Earth and Metropolis, and defeat the evil plans of the most cunning and powerful super-villains. With multiple endings, this You Choose bundle is a truly dynamic experience. The first story, Metropolis Mayhem is available to all users with purchase or FreeTime Unlimited subscription.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
